imdb.title: Orient
imdb.plot: In an era where Japan is under the control of demons, two warriors fight to overthrow their rule.

episodes.title: The Uesugi Band
episodes.plot: Musashi, Kojiro, and Tsugumi meet up with the gathering Uesugi Alliance in an effort to learn more about Kojiro's father. But with a battle against the Kishin of Awaji Island looming, the assembled forces might not be in the mood to indulge outsiders.

episodes.title: Shipboard Disgrace
episodes.plot: After volunteering to take part in a duel for the leadership of his unit, Musashi is confronted with a grim reality.

episodes.title: Equals
episodes.plot: Musashi's troubles in the Shimazu Unit seem to get worse and worse, with accusations of desertion and espionage thrown his way. At least he can turn to the gentle Michiru to take his side - or can he?

episodes.title: The War God's Mantle
episodes.plot: With the connection between Musashi and Michiru, the location of the Goddess Obsidian ends up being discovered by Yataro, who immediately warns the Black Dogs, and the group assembles a strategy to recover her.

episodes.title: Memories of Stone
episodes.plot: Two of the Obsidian Eight are assaulting the Uesugi castle with Yamata no Orochi, while a third member kidnaps Musashi and tries to convince Michiru to kill him.

episodes.title: Tactician Battle
episodes.plot: Battle lines are drawn, with the Obsidian Brotherhood out to defend Yamata no Orochi and capture the Obsidian Goddess, while Musashi works with the Uesugi Band to slay the Kishin and rescue his friends.

episodes.title: A Matter of Trust
episodes.plot: Naoe Kanetatsu of the Uesugi Bushi is facing off against Inukawa Seiroku of the Obsidian Eight. But how can he hope to defeat someone whose power seems to be inflicting physical trauma at will?

episodes.title: Leaving Your Mark
episodes.plot: Shiro's unique powers are enough to overwhelm an entire group of Bushi by himself. Does Naotora really stand a chance?

episodes.title: Clash of the Shimazu
episodes.plot: It's up to Musashi's squad to defeat Yataro, but the Shimazu siblings heading up their assault don't seem to be on the same page anymore.

episodes.title: Older and Younger Brothers
episodes.plot: The struggle to keep the white serpent from empowering Yamata no Orochi becomes desperate, as the truth behind the friction among the Shimazu brothers is revealed.

episodes.title: Greatsword of the Black Goddess
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: A Vow
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Musashi & Kojiro
episodes.plot: Musashi is a brilliant young miner who his companions consider one of the great promises to serve the oni, creatures of unknown origin who took the country many years ago and rule it with an iron fist. What they don't know is that Musashi wants to be a bushi, who hunt the oni.

episodes.title: Bushi's Pride
episodes.plot: Musashi and Kojiro try to tackle the powerful Kishin that has appeared, but will the two of them really be able to stand up to the class of oni that has dominated Hinomoto for over a hundred years?

episodes.title: The Outside World
episodes.plot: Kojiro and Musashi attempted to defeat the Kishin in front of them, but a band of Bushi interfered in their way! Will they defeat the Kishin and take their prize home?

episodes.title: The Kosameda Band
episodes.plot: Musashi and Kojiro's journey runs immediately into trouble when a mysterious girl steals their vehicle.

episodes.title: Choosing Tomorrow
episodes.plot: Musashi and Kojiro are forced to find a way to escape the Kosameda Castle prison, while Tsumugi is trapped between her desire to protect her friends and the commands of her domineering father.

episodes.title: Getting Stronger
episodes.plot: Tsumugi struggles with deciding what to do next, and Musashi encounters a mysterious, and unhinged, Bushi in black

episodes.title: You Can't Survive Underwater
episodes.plot: Musashi and Kojiro are out to obtain the Kitetsu Blades they'll need to fight oni, but a mysterious ritual involving the mystical swords might prove to be an unexpected hurdle.

episodes.title: The Obsidian Goddess
episodes.plot: Shiro offers to help Musashi overcome his difficulties with Kitetsu Blades and get stronger, but can he be trusted?

episodes.title: A Bushi's Way of Life
episodes.plot: As Shiro preys on the other Bushi who have gathered to hunt a Kishin, Musashi has to find a way to escape the lava pit and help his friends.

episodes.title: The Goddess's Power
episodes.plot: Musashi, Kojiro, and Tsugumi face off against Nanao and Shiro, and their only hope for victory might be the mysterious entity inside of Musashi.

episodes.title: What's in a Katana
episodes.plot: With the help of the obsidian goddess, the Kanemaki Bushi have managed to survive the attack by Shiro and Nanao. Before setting out for the next stop in their journey, there's one last thing Musashi needs to do.

episodes.title: Where This Road Leads
episodes.plot: Musashi, Kojiro, and Tsugumi are lost in the wilderness when a chance encounter sets them on course for a new adventure.
